column1: Stop users from making Leave Applications on following days.

column1: Please select Carry Forward if you also want to include previous fiscal year's balance leaves to this fiscal year

column1: Select Payment Account to make Bank Entry

ආදායම් මත පදනම් විචල්ය මත පදනම් වේ

column1: If selected, the value specified or calculated in this component will not contribute to the earnings or deductions. However, it's value can be referenced by other components that can be added or deducted.
column2: තෝරා ගත්තේ නම්, මෙම සංරචකය හි නිශ්චිතව දක්වා හෝ ගණනය වටිනාකම ආදායම අඩු හෝ දායක නැහැ. කෙසේ වෙතත්, එය අගය එකතු හෝ අඩු කළ හැකිය ෙවනත් සංරචක විසින් විමසිය හැකි ය.

column1: Only Tax Impact (Cannot Claim But Part of Taxable Income)
column2: බදු බලපෑම් පමණක් (හිමිකම් නොකෙරිය හැකි නමුත් ආදායම් බදු වලින් කොටසක්)

column1: Create Separate Payment Entry Against Benefit Claim

column1: Mark attendance based on 'Employee Checkin' for Employees assigned to this shift.

column1: Begin check-in before shift start time (in minutes)

column1: The time before the shift start time during which Employee Check-in is considered for attendance.

column1: Working Hours Threshold for Half Day

column1: Attendance will be marked automatically only after this date.

column1: Last Known Successful Sync of Employee Checkin. Reset this only if you are sure that all Logs are synced from all the locations. Please don't modify this if you are unsure.

column1: To date can not be greater than employee's relieving date.

column1: Payroll date can not be greater than employee's relieving date.
